title: Check Vendor Certificate of Insurance
description: Before an external catering company can work an event, the event manager must ensure their Certificate of Insurance (COI) is valid and meets venue requirements.

tasks.description: Request the COI from the catering vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a request to the vendor.

tasks.description: Review the received COI to ensure it meets the minimum coverage amounts specified in the venue's policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the COI against the requirements and confirms it is compliant.

tasks.description: Update the vendor's profile in the system to show their insurance is approved and on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the vendor's status to 'Approved'.
